source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_00<tab>Jannequinard of the Athenaeum Astrologicum simply cannot take his eyes off you.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_00<tab>L'astromancien ishgardais Jannequinard souhaite vous parler.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_01<tab>Jannequinard has invited you to study with him the many mysteries of the Sharlayan school of astrology.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_01<tab>Jannequinard vous a souhaité la bienvenue au sein de la communauté nouvellement créée des astromanciens d'Ishgard. Parlez-lui de nouveau.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_02<tab>You speak with Jannequinard and express your interest in his field of study. The astrologian accepts you with open arms and proceeds to give you your first astrology-related assignment─inquiring with other Athenaeum students on the whereabouts of an important visitant from Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_02<tab>Pour commencer votre en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment, Jannequinard vous a demandé de vous renseigner à propos de l'astromancien sharlayanais qui n'a toujours pas répondu à son invitation. Parlez aux astrologues dans le collège d'astromancie Saint-Guenriol.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_03<tab>The brains of the Athenaeum students have been picked clean. Inform Jannequinard of your findings.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez appris que la réponse de l'astromancien sharlayanais pourrait avoir atterri à l'Observatoire. Parlez à Jannequinard.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_04<tab>Jannequinard believes Forlemort of the Observatorium may be privy to information regarding the whereabouts of the missing Sharlayan party, and is resolved to make the journey south into the Coerthas central highlands to ask the chief astrologian himself. Jannequinard has requested that you meet him at the astroscope so that he will not have to entreat Forlemort alone.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_04<tab>Jannequinard pense que la réponse du Sharlayanais est pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment entre les mains de Forlemort, le directeur de l'Observatoire des Hautes terres du Coerthas central. Allez-y et parlez-lui.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_05<tab>A series of unpredictable circumstances forced the Sharlayan party to make a long and dangerous detour through the Black Shroud. If Chief Astrologian Forlemort's information is to be believed, the party lingers currently somewhere in the vicinity of Quarrymill. Jannequinard's retainer Quimperain is already en route to the hamlet. Join him in the search.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_05<tab>Forlemort n'était pas content d'apprendre qu'un Sharlayanais allait se mêler des affaires des astrologues ishgardais, mais il a tout de même consenti à vous donner le contenu de sa réponse. L'homme se trouverait quelque part vers le Moulin de la Carrière dans la Forêt du sud, livré à lui-même. Vous devez le retrouver avant qu'il ne lui arrive quelque chose<var 1D /var>! Rendez-vous sur place et parlez à Quimperain.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_06<tab>While Quimperain thanks you for your assistance in helping his master, he ever-so-subtly advises you against continuing your studies in astrology. Follow Quimperain into Snakemolt to commence your search for the Sharlayan party.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_06<tab>Après s'être à son tour permis quelques doutes sur les Sharlayanais, Quimperain vous a appris que l'astromancien que vous recherchez devrait se trouver au bocage de la Mue. Rejoignez-y votre compagnon.

source:
TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_07<tab>Quimperain locates the party, only to find that they have been beset by bandits. Elder astrologian Mace is dragged off at knifepoint by the ruffians, but not before he inconspicuously tosses his soul crystal in the loam for you to find. Mace's granddaughter claims that this turn of events was foretold in the stars, and that it is, and always has been, your fate to take up the crystal.

※The next astrologian job quest will be available from Leveva upon equipping the Soul of the Astrologian.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez retrouvé le fameux astromancien accompagné de sa petite-fille Leveva alors qu'il était aux prises avec un groupe de brigands. Ces derniers l'ont emmené et vous ont menacé de l'exécuter si vous ne leur livriez pas la jeune fille. Après leur départ, le cristal d'astromancien du vieil homme s'est mis à briller, et Leveva vous a assuré que cela faisait de vous son hériti<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. Équipez-vous du cristal et essayez d'en apprendre davantage auprès de la demoiselle.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab>Now, where to begin!? I suppose I could consult my divining deck for an answer, but that would be too easy now, wouldn't it? Very well, at the beginning it is!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, n'oubliez jamais que j'ai moi-même encore beaucoup de choses à découvrir sur cette discipline. J'espère que nous apprendrons l'un de l'autre au cours de votre initiation.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_Q1_000_000<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_Q1_000_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_002<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_003<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_004<tab>Astrology, or the reading of the stars, is a branch of aetherological science which originated in distant Sharlayan. There have been astrologians in Ishgard for thousands of years, but it wasn't until three centuries ago when Adaunel the Younger learned that the movement of the stars could also be used to foresee the movements of the Dravanian Horde that the field became popular.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_004<tab>Depuis son in<var 16 /var>tro<var 16 /var>duc<var 16 /var>tion à Ishgard, l'astromancie a prin<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment été utilisée pour observer et prévoir les mouvements des hordes dravaniennes.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_005<tab>Since then, what was once a single science has bifurcated into two similar yet ultimately different schools of learning: the Sharlayan school of astrology and the Ishgardian school─the former placing a focus on tapping celestial aether and transforming it into beneficial magicks, or astromancy, the latter specializing solely in determining the actions of our dragon enemies to the north.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_005<tab>C'est la raison pour laquelle les astromanciens sont devenus des “astrologues” dans la sainte Cité.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_006<tab>I am a student of the former─the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> student of the former here in Ishgard─and have been actively seeking a partner with whom to conduct my research. Let us just say that my fellow astrologians here have been less than approving of my path. But that is simply because they are afraid of what they do not know. Once they <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> know of how Sharlayan astrology can benefit the See and its soldiers, they will feel foolish for ever having doubted me...ah, us!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_006<tab>J'ai donc pensé qu'il était temps de remettre la véritable bénédiction des étoiles, l'astromancie, à la place qui lui revient de droit. Car qui ne voudrait pas recevoir l'aide des astres pour soutenir ses camarades au cours des batailles, grâce à des sorts de magie pouvant changer le cours du destin<var 1D /var>? Je vous le demande<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_007<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be joining me, will you not? Walking the path that has been laid out before you, instead of stubbornly denying your fate, postponing the inevitable?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_007<tab>Bien, je crois qu'il est grand temps de rentrer dans le vif du sujet. Prenez un moment pour vous préparer si besoin est, et revenez me voir ensuite.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_008<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_009<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab>I see you wasted no time making your decision. Like I always say, the stars are never wrong!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_010<tab>Ça y est, vous êtes prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à marcher main dans la main avec votre destin<var 1D /var>? Vous m'en voyez ravi.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_011<tab>Dammy
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_012<tab>Alas, even a lifetime of study and training cannot unlock <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the secrets written in those stars. Myself, I have been a student of the astromantic arts for more summers than I can count, and I still oft misread the signs shown to me in the skies. Though, my readings are far more accurate now than they were when I attended the Athenaeum in Sharlayan. Not <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> Sharlayan, mind you. The colony that once thrived in the Dravanian hinterlands.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_012<tab>Il y a un certain nombre d'années, avant l'exode, les murailles de la cité de Sharlayan se dressaient dans une région occidentale reculée de l'Arrière-pays dravanien. En ce temps-là, je n'étais qu'un jeune homme désireux d'étudier l'astromancie auprès des plus grands spé<var 16 /var>cia<var 16 /var>listes.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_013<tab>I can recall my time there like it was but yesterday. The first six moons, I was not even allowed to touch the Deck of Sixty, let alone conduct a reading with the major arcana. Most of my time was spent in the scriptorium transcribing old tomes on astrological fundamentals such as the six elemental houses, divine duplicity, class triplicity, house modality and polarity, dignity versus detriment...
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_013<tab>Les Ishgardais pratiquent ce qu'on appelle la “science des étoiles”. Ils étudient les mouvements des voûtes célestes et des éléments qui les composent pour prévoir les attaques des Dravaniens.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_014<tab>I abhorred the task, and would tirelessly pester my instructors as to when I might actually be granted the opportunity to weave a spell or perform a reading. It wasn't until the end of the sixth moon that I realized all that transcribing had prepared me with the essentials I would need to do those very things.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_014<tab>Mais l'astromancie sharlayanaise est différente. C'est avant tout un type de magie qui tire sa puissance de la bénédiction des étoiles.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_015<tab>The positions of the celestial bodies within the six elemental houses, and their relation to the major and minor arcana of the Deck of Sixty─therein lie the secrets to tapping the aetherial power locked in the heavens.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_015<tab>Un astrologue ishgardais qui voudrait s'initier à l'astromancie devrait donc d'abord recevoir l'en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment de base dédié aux mages.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_016<tab>And soon, you too will become privy to these secrets.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_016<tab>Cependant, je dois reconnaître qu'il y a déjà une grande énergie magique en vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Je pense que vous n'aurez aucun mal à passer le rite d'initiation. Mais avant cela, il nous reste un petit détail à régler...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_017<tab>But not this day. No, no. I would not have you transcribe musty old tomes, like I was once forced to do. No, the task I have for you is <var 1A 02 /var>much<var 1A 01 /var> more interesting. You see, I am expecting the arrival of a very important guest─my old mentor from the Studium has agreed to make the journey from the Old World to Ishgard and speak with the Holy See regarding the implementation of Sharlayan astrological techniques in city<var 1F /var>state defense.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_017<tab>Voyez-vous, j'ai envoyé une invitation à un éminent professeur sharlayanais pour qu'il vienne dans notre collège, mais il ne semble toujours pas avoir répondu à l'heure qu'il est.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_018<tab>Alas, the professor and his party are now fully seven days late in arriving, and I have begun to worry for their safety. I should be much obliged, therefore, if you would inquire of the other astrologians here at the Athenaeum if they have heard aught.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_018<tab>Peut-être pourriez-vous interroger les astrologues autour de nous afin d'en apprendre davantage<var 1D /var>? Que la bénédiction des étoiles soit sur vous, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_019<tab>...Beg pardon? If the professor is so important to me, why haven't I asked them myself? Ah, let us just say that the other astrologians and I do not always see eye to eye on everything...or, in fact, anything.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_019<tab>Que la bénédiction des étoiles soit sur vous, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_020<tab>Why would Lord Jannequinard think I had information on the whereabouts of a handful of unbelievers from across the Bloodbrine Sea? I am an astrologian, not a fortune-teller. I cannot simply look to the stars and scry the location of the viscount's guests...unless his guests are dragons, that is.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_020<tab>Le professeur sharlayanais qui doit nous rendre visite<var 1D /var>? Non, toujours pas de réponse de sa part... Toutefois, il est possible que la lettre soit tombée dans les mains de l'Observatoire.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_021<tab>I suppose if anyone knew aught, it would be the Observatorium. We here at the Athenaeum are but students dedicated to research. Those with any influence in our field are assigned to the astroscope.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_021<tab>Notre collège n'est qu'un laboratoire de recherche, si je puis dire. Toute la pratique se passe à l'Observatoire, le centre névralgique de l'astrologie ishgardaise.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_028<tab>Why would Lord Jannequinard think I had information on the whereabouts of a handful of unbelievers from across the Bloodbrine Sea? I am an astrologian, not a fortune-teller. I cannot simply look to the stars and scry the location of the viscount's guests...unless his guests are dragons, that is.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_028<tab>Le professeur sharlayanais qui doit nous rendre visite<var 1D /var>? Non, toujours pas de réponse de sa part... Toutefois, il est possible que la lettre soit tombée dans les mains de l'Observatoire.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_029<tab>I suppose if anyone knew aught, it would be the Observatorium. We here at the Athenaeum are but students dedicated to research. Those with any influence in our field are assigned to the astroscope.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_HEURRIETTE_000_029<tab>Notre collège n'est qu'un laboratoire de recherche, si je puis dire. Toute la pratique se passe à l'Observatoire, le centre névralgique de l'astromancie ishgardaise.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_020<tab>Let me guess, the good Lord Jannequinard said he saw you in a vision and that the stars told him that you were to study Sharlayan astrology with him. Am I close? You must be the hundredth of his little pets to pester me this week alone.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_020<tab>Vous cherchez un professeur sharlayanais<var 1D /var>? Euh, désolé mais je ne suis au courant de rien... C'est sire Jannequinard qui vous envoie, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_021<tab>I harbor no ill will toward ignorant unbelievers unlucky enough to find themselves caught up in talk of stars and fortunes, but you may tell that sorry excuse for an astrologian─<var 1A 02 /var>for the umpteenth time<var 1A 01 /var>─that I have heard <var 1A 02 /var>naught<var 1A 01 /var> concerning his imaginary friends from faraway Sharlayan. (Just do not tell the viscount I called him a sorry excuse for an astrologian, all right?)
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_021<tab>Je ne comprends pas pourquoi il insiste tellement pour inclure ces techniques étrangères... Franchement, que voulez-vous que nous fassions de sorts de magie qui n'ont pas pour but premier de repousser les Dravaniens<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_028<tab>Let me guess, the good Lord Jannequinard said he saw you in a vision and that the stars told him that you were to study Sharlayan astrology with him. Am I close? You must be the hundredth of his little pets to pester me this week alone.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_028<tab>Vous cherchez un professeur sharlayanais<var 1D /var>? Euh, désolé mais je ne suis au courant de rien... C'est sire Jannequinard qui vous envoie, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_029<tab>I harbor no ill will toward ignorant unbelievers unlucky enough to find themselves caught up in talk of stars and fortunes, but you may tell that sorry excuse for an astrologian─<var 1A 02 /var>for the umpteenth time<var 1A 01 /var>─that I have heard <var 1A 02 /var>naught<var 1A 01 /var> concerning his imaginary friends from faraway Sharlayan. (Just do not tell the viscount I called him a sorry excuse for an astrologian, all right?)
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MUGUENIEL_000_029<tab>Je ne comprends pas pourquoi il insiste tellement pour inclure ces techniques étrangères... Franchement, que voulez-vous que nous fassions de sorts de magie qui n'ont pas pour but premier de repousser les Dravaniens<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_020<tab>Jannequinard is still waiting for word on his missing Sharlayans instead of actually making an effort to find them, is he? Of course he is. Is it any wonder that in the nearly fifteen years since his return from Sharlayan, his skill in astromancy has remained unchanged? Any wonder that he has never yet managed to convince a single peer of the value of the Sharlayan school? He is a privileged little sprat who spends more time gazing at the stars in young maidens' eyes than actually trying to read the ones above his head.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_020<tab>Un astromancien sharlayanais, vous dites<var 1D /var>? Figurez-vous que je reviens de l'Observatoire et il me semble bien que sire Forlemort marmonnait quelque chose à ce propos...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_021<tab><sigh> All right, all right. You tell the poor man I just returned from the Observatorium, and one night at the communal feasting hall, happened to overhear Chief Astrologian Forlemort speaking with one of his aides regarding Sharlayan. He was visibly upset, and I wasn't about to risk my career over something I care little about, so I merely put my head down and ate my beet soup. But that is all I know, and you did not hear it from me.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_021<tab>Il était en train de lire une lettre et tout à coup, il a lâché un sacré cri de colère<var 1D /var>! J'ai tout de suite pensé qu'une telle réaction ne pouvait qu'avoir un lien avec Sharlayan...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_028<tab>Jannequinard is still waiting for word on his missing Sharlayans instead of actually making an effort to find them, is he? Of course he is. Is it any wonder that in the nearly fifteen years since his return from Sharlayan, his skill in astromancy has remained unchanged? Any wonder that he has never yet managed to convince a single peer of the value of the Sharlayan school? He is a privileged little sprat who spends more time gazing at the stars in young maidens' eyes than actually trying to read the ones above his head.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_028<tab>Un astromancien sharlayanais, vous dites<var 1D /var>? Figurez-vous que je reviens de l'Observatoire et il me semble bien que sire Forlemort marmonnait quelque chose à ce propos...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_029<tab><sigh> All right, all right. You tell the poor man I just returned from the Observatorium, and one night at the communal feasting hall, happened to overhear Chief Astrologian Forlemort speaking with one of his aides regarding Sharlayan. He was visibly upset, and I wasn't about to risk my career over something I care little about, so I merely put my head down and ate my beet soup. But that is all I know, and you did not hear it from me.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FLEURAIE_000_029<tab>Il était en train de lire une lettre et tout à coup, il a lâché un sacré cri de colère<var 1D /var>! J'ai tout de suite pensé qu'une telle réaction ne pouvait qu'avoir un lien avec Sharlayan...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_030<tab>Master Forlemort!? And I thought this day could not get any worse... Ah? Oh, no. I'm not suggesting that meeting <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> in any way has been unfortunate. It is just...ah...that, er... It may not be in our best interests to be seen together as of yet. There are certain people in the See who do not approve of my studies. Couple that with the fact that you are an outsider and an unbeliever, and...well, people may come to the wrong conclusions.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_030<tab>Tiens donc, Forlemort aurait reçu une lettre... C'est bien la dernière personne que j'aurais mise au courant de cette invitation, mais les voies du destin sont im<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>né<var 16 /var>tra<var 16 /var>bles.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_031<tab>We must act with caution until we can prove that our intentions are just and for the good of all Ishgard. So, I must ask you to travel to the Observatorium alone, and meet me there.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_031<tab>Face à ce genre de difficultés, un astromancien doit essayer d'aiguiller le destin dans la bonne direction, tout simplement. C'est toujours le meilleur moyen de recevoir la bénédiction des astres. Nous allons donc nous rendre tous les deux à l'Observatoire, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_040<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Allow me to apologize again for not accompanying you here. As for our business with the chief astrologian, you may leave the talking to me.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_040<tab>Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aussi vite, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'allais justement m'entretenir avec sire Forlemort.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_041<tab>Ah, Jannequinard. I might have known it would be you. Who else would be so indecent as to drag an outsider into this holy place of observation?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_041<tab>Vous revoilà donc en compagnie de Jannequinard, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. Je savais bien qu'on ne pouvait pas faire confiance aux étrangers...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_042<tab>You have always had an unhealthy obsession with the foreign. 'Tis why you are as worthless to the Athenaeum now as you were when you returned from that heathen city a decade and a half since.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_042<tab>Combien de fois devrai-je vous répéter que la sainte Cité n'a pas besoin de ces sorts sharlayanais de pacotille<var 1D /var>? C'est une évidence absolue pour tout Ishgardais qui se respecte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_043<tab>But the stars, they can serve us in other ways than merely revealing when the Horde will attack. Their powers can be tapped! The aether within can be used for─
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_043<tab>Les dragons ne sont pas la seule préoccupation des astres, cher Directeur. Si vous teniez réellement à venir en aide à vos compatriotes, vous adopteriez un point de vue bien plus large du monde qui vous entoure.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_044<tab>The aether should be left be! Has history taught you naught about the folly of the Nymians? The Amdapori? The Mhachi?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_044<tab>Je n'ai pas de leçons à recevoir d'un blanc-bec comme vous<var 1D /var>! Je n'ai peut-être pas votre rang mais ici, c'est moi qui commande, Jannequinard de Durendaire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_045<tab>Mine uncle, the Sharlayans have been wielding astromancy for ages without disrupting aetherial balance. This power, combined with Ishgardian astrology, could be what is needed to turn the tide of this thousand-year conflict. Moreover, I have reason to believe that our masters at the Vault agree, as they have given me their blessing to continue my research.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_045<tab>Vous avez tort de vous emporter ainsi. Nous avons le même but, mais nous sommes en désaccord sur les moyens pour y parvenir, voilà tout. De plus, je vous rappelle que mes recherches ont été of<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ciel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment approuvées par le Saint-Siège.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_046<tab><sigh> I did not come to trade barbs with you, Nuncle. Let us save that for another time. I am here because it has come to my attention that you may have information as to the whereabouts of Professor Mace and his party from Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_046<tab>Je vous prie donc de bien vouloir me transmettre le contenu de la lettre de l'astromancien sharlayanais que vous venez de recevoir.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_047<tab>For someone who says he is not here to trade barbs, you have been quite generous in your dealing of them today. If it means you will leave and allow me to return to my work, then I'd be more than happy to let you know what information found its way to my desk just yesterday morn.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_047<tab>Eh bien, si même le Saint-Siège apporte son soutien à vos lubies, nous pouvons nous préparer pour la fin des temps<var 1D /var>! Mais je suppose qu'un étranger de plus ou de moins ne changera pas grand-chose au fait que vos recherches sont vouées à l'échec, mon pauvre Jannequinard.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_048<tab>Serpent Reaver sightings and foul weather prevented the professor's ship from entering the Strait of Merlthor, where they would have made their way up the Maiden and into Coerthas. After detouring around the south of Vylbrand, they finally disembarked at Vesper Bay, where they took the land route along the Royal Allagan Sunway to the Black Shroud. It is there, it seems, they lost their way. A <var 1A 02 /var>lost<var 1A 01 /var> astrologian! Hah!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_048<tab>Pour répondre à votre question, votre ami sharlayanais contemple en ce moment même les arbres qui entourent le Moulin de la Carrière, dans la Forêt du sud. Le bougre n'a pas trouvé son chemin jusqu'à vous, dites donc<var 1D /var>! Ça prouve à quel point il en a dans la caboche...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_049<tab>It is as my morning reading predicted. Dalamud was in detriment in the House of the Spire while ascending over the ecliptic! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must journey to the Black Shroud and assist Professor Mace. Allow me to introduce you to Quimperain. He is my personal manservant, and shall accompany you.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_049<tab>Je vois. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, un<var 08 E905 ((e aventurière)) (( aventurier)) /var> aussi expérimenté<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> que vous doit connaître ce lieu comme sa poche, non<var 1D /var>? Emmenez mon serviteur Quimperain avec vous et ramenez le professeur sain et sauf, s'il vous plaît.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_050<tab>He is not one for conversation, but his sword arm is amongst the best in all the Pillars. He should see you safe if any danger were to befall you, and something tells me danger lurks on the horizon.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_JANNEQUINARD_000_050<tab>Je vous attendrai au collège. Merci, et que les astres vous protègent, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_051<tab>It is a pleasure to serve you, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. I shall make haste to Quarrymill and await you there.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_051<tab>Je m'en remets à votre bienveillance, <var 08 E905 ((Dame)) ((Sire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Rendons-nous sans plus tarder au Moulin de la Carrière.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_059<tab>I know not which is worse─the blasphemous wretch who mocks the very principles from which our field is sown, or the bumbling unbeliever who blindly follows him in hopes of gnawing on the scraps he drops in his wake.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_FORLEMORT_000_059<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que vous voulez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_060<tab><var 08 E905 ((Milady)) ((Milord)) /var>. I have questioned the residents of this hamlet and learned that a party of queerly dressed outsiders passed through not but a bell ago. It should not prove overly difficult to find them now...but before we begin, might I ask a moment of your time?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_060<tab>Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> aussi vite, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. À mon avis, nous devrions commencer notre enquête ici, mais avant cela... j'ai quelque chose à vous avouer, maintenant que vous avez décidé de suivre la voie tracée par maître Jannequinard.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_061<tab>I would not dare utter aught ill of my master, but his recent fixation with finding a protégé... I believe it ill considered. This passion, however pure, has left him with more than one enemy within the astrological community. Lord Forlemort has seen to this.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_061<tab>Il est tellement absorbé par son étude de l'astromancie qu'il arrivera cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment à en tirer quelque chose de profitable pour tout le monde, cela ne fait à mon avis aucun doute. Le problème, c'est que nos activités nous attirent les foudres de toute une partie des citoyens ishgardais.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_062<tab>I fear not only for how his name might be sullied...but for his life.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_062<tab>Je dois admettre que je suis moi-même partagé entre ma confiance envers mon maître, et ma méfiance pour tout ce qui provient de Sharlayan...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_063<tab>I beg of you. Pray, do not drag him any further down into this quagmire. Let him quietly dabble in his dream, but let it remain at that─a dream. No good will come of encouraging him. It will only hurt the viscount and his family. You must remember that while I serve Lord Jannequinard, it is his uncle, the count, who employs me.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_063<tab>Ne vous méprenez pas, je souhaite du fond du cœur que les recherches de sire Jannequinard aboutissent. Veuillez m'excuser si je vous ai perturbé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_064<tab>Now, as for the task at hand, I suggest we find the wayward travelers and hurry back to our respective hearths. I shall lead. Might I ask you to take the rear and see that none might take us unawares?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_064<tab>En tout cas, les habitants de cet endroit m'ont dit avoir aperçu quelqu'un qui devrait être notre homme au bocage de la Mue. Je pars devant, retrouvez-moi là-bas.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_070<tab>Grandfather...
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_070<tab>Grand-père...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_090<tab>These are the Sharlayans we seek, and it appears they have found themselves some trouble.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_090<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous arrivez à temps<var 1D /var>! Ces brigands en veulent à la vie de notre invité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_091<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)Unhand my grandfather!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_091<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)Grand-père...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_CELIE_000_092<tab>Ah, feisty. We'll fetch a fine price for that one from the pleasure barge captains.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_CELIE_000_092<tab>(-Chef des brigands-)Ho ho, la jolie poupée que voilà... Certains paieraient cher pour profiter de ses avantages<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MACE_000_094<tab>The Soul...has spoken...
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_MACE_000_094<tab>(-Astromancien âgé-)C'est donc <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var>... l'élu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>...

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_CELIE_000_093<tab>Grab the old man. These wizard types carry on them all manner of begemmed baubles and golden trinkets.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_CELIE_000_093<tab>Emmenez le vieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_BUKA02012_000_095<tab>Up, or I'll toss you to the snakes!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_BUKA02012_000_095<tab>T'as entendu, Papy<var 1D /var>? On y va<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_CELIE_000_096<tab>You want to see the old man again, you leave us the girl. Try anything, and he's dead.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_CELIE_000_096<tab>Si vous voulez revoir le vieux croulant en vie, livrez-nous la fille, ou on le découpera en petits morceaux et on emballera chacun d'entre eux dans de jolis paquets cadeaux avant de vous les envoyer<var 1D /var>! Compris<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_097<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)Wait!
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_097<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)Grand-père, non<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_098<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)Grandfather's soul crystal... Why would he leave it here, surrendering any power he might have had to free himself from those bandits?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_098<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)<var 2B ((<var 33 ((Item)) 03F222880202 /var>)) /var> de Grand-père... Pourquoi brille-t-il ainsi, tout à coup<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_099<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)Unless... You were the one he saw in his reading before we left the Old World... But that was more than a moon ago! My grandfather scried from the cards that he would serve as the bridge for countless souls to be passed to another... Might <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> be that other...?
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_099<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)Se pourrait-il que... Oui, ça ne peut être que ça. Mon grand-père a lu dans votre destin, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. <var 2B ((<var 33 ((Item)) 06F222880202 /var>)) /var> l'a prouvé.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_100<tab>These men of the forests are careless. Tracking them will be no difficult feat. I shall follow and strike before they have time to regroup in numbers.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_QUIMPERAIN_000_100<tab>Je vais tenter d'obtenir des renforts<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, mettez cette jeune fille hors de danger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_101<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)The stars have spoken and laid their path not before you, but before the adventurer here.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_101<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)Vous n'avez pas besoin de vous affoler, chevalier. Grand-père n'a besoin de rien d'autre que de l'astromancie pour être tiré d'affaire.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_102<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)You. You must take the Soul of the Astrologian and place it near your heart.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_102<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Tenez, prenez ce cristal.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_103<tab>(-Mace's Granddaughter-)Listen to the tales of those who walked before you, and know their journeys as you do your own.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_103<tab>(-Jeune inconnue-)Vous obtiendrez ainsi la source du savoir de tous les astromanciens qui vous ont précédé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Leur énergie vitale viendra se mêler à celle du cristal.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_104<tab>(-Leveva-)As for the tools you require and the knowledge needed to wield them, I, Leveva, shall see to those matters.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_104<tab>(-Leveva-)Allons, n'ayez pas peur. Je sais ce que je dis puisque c'est mon grand-père qui m'a tout appris<var 1D /var>! À moi, sa petite-fille Leveva, de transmettre mon savoir et de vous enseigner l'art de l'astromancie et le maniement du globe céleste.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_105<tab>(-Leveva-)You saw there was no fear in my grandfather's eyes when the bandits took him. This is because he has seen you come to his rescue.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_105<tab>(-Leveva-)Grâce à ça, vous deviendrez l'un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> des nôtres et sauverez mon grand-père sans problème, j'en suis absolument certaine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_106<tab>(-Leveva-)Our lives were written in the stars long before we trod upon this land. It is not by chance that you stand here today with the Soul of the Astrologian in your hand. It is fate.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_LEVEVA_000_106<tab>(-Leveva-)Vous ne vous en rendez peut-être pas encore compte, mais c'est le destin qui nous a réuni<var 08 E905 ((es)) ((s)) /var>. Dorénavant, le globe céleste ne fera plus qu'un avec votre esprit, et les étoiles vous combleront de leurs bienfaits<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>You have unlocked a new job! You can change to this job at any time by equipping the weapon received from this quest.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>Vous avez accès à un nouveau job<var 1D /var>! Pour en changer, il suffit de vous équiper de l'arme que vous venez de recevoir.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>When changing jobs, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between jobs instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>Après avoir changé de job, pensez à enregistrer votre tenue<var 1D /var>! Cela vous permettra de modifier votre équipement en un éclair.

source: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_122<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
target: TEXT_JOBAST300_02012_SYSTEM_000_122<tab>Vous pouvez enregistrer une tenue depuis la fenêtre de personnage, où est géré votre équipement.
